name: George Wildridge
body:
# About
I am a high school student interested in machine learning. In this academic blog I hope to document the projects I am working on. 


#My Work
### [CS231n](http://georgewildridge.github.io/CS231n)
I am working through Stanford's course "Convolutional Neural Networks for Visual Recognition."

### [CS231n Final Project](http://georgewildridge.github.io/CS231nProject/)
I learn to work with a deep learning library and some really cool demos. 

### [Yale's Social Robotics Lab 2016](http://georgewildridge.github.io/ScazLab2016)
The work I am doing at Yale this summer under Dr. Alessandro Roncone and Dr. Olivier Mangin.

### [Yale's Social Robotics Lab 2015](http://georgewildridge.github.io/ScazLab2015)
The work I did at Yale in the summer of 2015 under Dr. Bradley Hayes.

### [Yale's Social Robotics Lab 2014](http://georgewildridge.github.io/ScazLab2014)
The work I did at Yale in the summer of 2014 under Dr. Bradley Hayes.


#Side Projects
### [Meteor Website]()
This is the code for a really basic website a friend and I worked together to create using the javascript package Meteor.js.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
